name: Thriftbook
tagline: Source for the examples in the Programmer's Guide to Apache Thrift
body:
### Welcome to the Source Repo for The Programmer's Guide to Apache Thrift
The Programmer's Guide to Apache Thrift is a new book from [Manning Publications](http://manning.com). The book is currently in early access (MEAP) and approximately 75% of the chapters are available electronically now. The Apache Thrift example code in this repository is covered in detail in the book. To acquire a copy of the source, simply clone this repository:

```
$ cd path/where/you/want/the/source
$ git clone https://github.com/RandyAbernethy/ThriftBook
```

### Working with the Source
Apache Thrift is a cross language RPC framework. The source code in this repo covers and range of languages and each will have its own prerequisites, as described in the book. The code examples generally require Apache Thrift v0.9.2 at a minimum.

### Author
This source and the book were written by @RandyAbernethy.

### Support 
Support for the book and its sources are available through [Manning Author Online](http://www.manning-sandbox.com/forum.jspa?forumID=873).
